titles.title: States' Medical Marijuana Property Rights Protection Act
States’ Medical Marijuana Property Rights Protection Act
To amend the Controlled Substances Act so as to exempt real property from civil forfeiture due to medical marijuana-related conduct that is authorized by State law.

bill.summary:
States' Medical Marijuana Property Rights Protection Act
This bill amends the Controlled Substances Act to exempt real property from civil forfeiture due to medical marijuana-related conduct that is authorized by state law.
